db:abstract.db:para: Generates a D-Bus interface from a header file.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: Parses the C++ source or header file containing a QObject-derived class declaration and generates a file containing the D-BUS Introspection XML.

By default, the generated XML file is stored in the current binary directory, and has the same base name as the header. You can specify a different name or path by adding customName as an optional second argument.

db:section.db:title: Options
db:section.db:para: The function sets up a call to the qdbuscpp2xml command line tool. Further arguments to the tool can be set after OPTIONS.
